Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: This looks like a good approach. Can you add "fixes #1209" to the commit message?

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: In these cases, you should add an "error" member to the result with a message like "workspaces beginning with underscores are reserved as internal".

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: This could use a unit test. More information at http://i3wm.org/docs/testsuite.html

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: Also I think the next two patches could be squashed together into this one

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: While you are right, this does not have to be done in the very same patch.
